content: Beginning with Work Truck Attachments, where we had another strong quarter, we produced a record net sales of $130.4 million more than 25% higher than second quarter of last year, almost $33.6 million of adjusted EBITDA, also above last year's number. Turning to our Work Truck Solutions segment, where we delivered $57.2 million of net sales and $500,000 of adjusted EBITDA for the quarter. From a consolidated perspective, we generated record second quarter net sales of $187.6 million and gross profit of $51.2 million compared to net sales of $157.5 million and gross profit of $48.8 million during the second quarter of last year. For the second quarter, we generated consolidated adjusted EBITDA of $34.1 million relatively flat compared to $33.5 million in the corresponding period of the prior-year. On an adjusted basis, we generated net income of $20.1 million or $0.85 per diluted share, compared to adjusted net income of $21.3 million or $0.91 per diluted share in the prior-year. For the second quarter, our Work Truck Attachments segment generated record net sales of $130.4 million significantly higher than the $104.6 million last year and adjusted EBITDA of $33.6 million, a slight increase when compared to adjusted EBITDA of $32.2 million recorded in the prior-year. That brings us to work truck solutions where we reported net sales of $57.2 million and adjusted EBITDA of 513,000 compared to net sales of $52.9 million and adjusted EBITDA of $1.3 million in the same period last year. Net cash used by operating activities during the first six months of 2022 was $58.2 million, compared to $13.1 million cash provided for the same period last year. Accounts receivable were $127.9 million compared to $92.1 million at the end of the second quarter 2021, which is in line with the increased sales year-over-year.
